properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.filter.json-to-grpc.enabled
properties.description: Enables the JSON to gRPC filter.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.filter.local-response-cache.size
properties.description: Maximum size of the cache to evict entries for this route (in KB, MB and GB).

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.filter.local-response-cache.time-to-live
properties.description: Time to expire a cache entry (expressed in s for seconds, m for minutes, and h for hours).

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.global-filter.local-response-cache.enabled
properties.description: Enables the local-response-cache filter for all routes, it allows to add a specific configuration at route level using LocalResponseCache filter.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.forwarded.by.enabled
properties.description: Enables the Forwarded: by header part.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.httpserver.wiretap
properties.description: Enables wiretap debugging for Netty HttpServer.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.globalcors.add-to-simple-url-handler-mapping
properties.description: If global CORS config should be added to the URL handler.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.restrictive-property-accessor.enabled
properties.description: Restricts method and property access in SpEL.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.observability.enabled
properties.description: If Micrometer Observability support should be turned on.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.predicate.host.include-port
properties.description: Include the port in matching the host name.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.server.webflux.route-refresh-listener.enabled
properties.description: If RouteRefreshListener should be turned on.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.default-filters
properties.description: List of filter definitions that are applied to every route.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.discovery.locator.enabled
properties.description: Flag that enables DiscoveryClient gateway integration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.discovery.locator.include-expression
properties.description: SpEL expression that will evaluate whether to include a service in gateway integration or not, defaults to: true.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.discovery.locator.lower-case-service-id
properties.description: Option to lower case serviceId in predicates and filters, defaults to false. Useful with eureka when it automatically uppercases serviceId. so MYSERIVCE, would match /myservice/**

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.discovery.locator.route-id-prefix
properties.description: The prefix for the routeId, defaults to discoveryClient.getClass().getSimpleName() + "_". Service Id will be appended to create the routeId.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.discovery.locator.url-expression
properties.description: SpEL expression that create the uri for each route, defaults to: 'lb://'+serviceId.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.fail-on-route-definition-error
properties.description: Option to fail on route definition errors, defaults to true. Otherwise, a warning is logged.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.filter.json-to-grpc.enabled
properties.description: Enables the JSON to gRPC filter.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.filter.local-response-cache.size
properties.description: Maximum size of the cache to evict entries for this route (in KB, MB and GB).

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.filter.local-response-cache.time-to-live
properties.description: Time to expire a cache entry (expressed in s for seconds, m for minutes, and h for hours).

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.filter.secure-headers.content-security-policy
properties.defaultValue: default-src 'self' https:; font-src 'self' https: data:; img-src 'self' https: data:; object-src 'none'; script-src https:; style-src 'self' https: 'unsafe-inline'

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.filter.secure-headers.permissions-policy
properties.defaultValue: accelerometer=(), ambient-light-sensor=(), autoplay=(), battery=(), camera=(), cross-origin-isolated=(), display-capture=(), document-domain=(), encrypted-media=(), execution-while-not-rendered=(), execution-while-out-of-viewport=(), fullscreen=(), geolocation=(), gyroscope=(), keyboard-map=(), magnetometer=(), microphone=(), midi=(), navigation-override=(), payment=(), picture-in-picture=(), publickey-credentials-get=(), screen-wake-lock=(), sync-xhr=(), usb=(), web-share=(), xr-spatial-tracking=()

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.forwarded.by.enabled
properties.description: Enables the Forwarded: by header part.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.global-filter.local-response-cache.enabled
properties.description: Enables the local-response-cache filter for all routes, it allows to add a specific configuration at route level using LocalResponseCache filter.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.globalcors.add-to-simple-url-handler-mapping
properties.description: If global CORS config should be added to the URL handler.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.connect-timeout
properties.description: The connect timeout in millis, the default is 30s.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.acquire-timeout
properties.description: Only for type FIXED, the maximum time in millis to wait for acquiring.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.eviction-interval
properties.description: Perform regular eviction checks in the background at a specified interval. Disabled by default ({@link Duration#ZERO})

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.leasing-strategy
properties.description: Configures the leasing strategy for the pool (fifo or lifo), defaults to FIFO which is Netty's default.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.max-connections
properties.description: Only for type FIXED, the maximum number of connections before starting pending acquisition on existing ones.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.max-idle-time
properties.description: Time in millis after which the channel will be closed. If NULL, there is no max idle time.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.max-life-time
properties.description: Duration after which the channel will be closed. If NULL, there is no max life time.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.metrics
properties.description: Enables channel pools metrics to be collected and registered in Micrometer. Disabled by default.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.name
properties.description: The channel pool map name, defaults to proxy.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.pool.type
properties.description: Type of pool for HttpClient to use (elastic, fixed or disabled).

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.proxy.host
properties.description: Hostname for proxy configuration of Netty HttpClient.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.proxy.non-proxy-hosts-pattern
properties.description: Regular expression (Java) for a configured list of hosts. that should be reached directly, bypassing the proxy

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.proxy.password
properties.description: Password for proxy configuration of Netty HttpClient.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.proxy.port
properties.description: Port for proxy configuration of Netty HttpClient.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.proxy.type
properties.description: proxyType for proxy configuration of Netty HttpClient (http, socks4 or socks5).

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.proxy.username
properties.description: Username for proxy configuration of Netty HttpClient.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.close-notify-flush-timeout
properties.description: SSL close_notify flush timeout. Default to 3000 ms.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.close-notify-read-timeout
properties.description: SSL close_notify read timeout. Default to 0 ms.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.handshake-timeout
properties.description: SSL handshake timeout. Default to 10000 ms

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.key-password
properties.description: Key password, default is same as keyStorePassword.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.key-store-provider
properties.description: Keystore provider for Netty HttpClient, optional field.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.key-store-type
properties.description: Keystore type for Netty HttpClient, default is JKS.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.ssl-bundle
properties.description: The name of the SSL bundle to use.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.trusted-x509-certificates
properties.description: Trusted certificates for verifying the remote endpoint's certificate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.ssl.use-insecure-trust-manager
properties.description: Installs the netty InsecureTrustManagerFactory. This is insecure and not suitable for production.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.websocket.proxy-ping
properties.description: Proxy ping frames to downstream services, defaults to true.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpclient.wiretap
properties.description: Enables wiretap debugging for Netty HttpClient.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.httpserver.wiretap
properties.description: Enables wiretap debugging for Netty HttpServer.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Enables the collection of metrics data.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.metrics.prefix
properties.description: The prefix of all metrics emitted by gateway.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.metrics.tags
properties.description: Tags map that added to metrics.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.observability.enabled
properties.description: If Micrometer Observability support should be turned on.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.predicate.host.include-port
properties.description: Include the port in matching the host name.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.redis-rate-limiter.burst-capacity-header
properties.description: The name of the header that returns the burst capacity configuration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.redis-rate-limiter.include-headers
properties.description: Whether or not to include headers containing rate limiter information, defaults to true.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.redis-rate-limiter.remaining-header
properties.description: The name of the header that returns number of remaining requests during the current second.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.redis-rate-limiter.replenish-rate-header
properties.description: The name of the header that returns the replenish rate configuration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.redis-rate-limiter.requested-tokens-header
properties.description: The name of the header that returns the requested tokens configuration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.restrictive-property-accessor.enabled
properties.description: Restricts method and property access in SpEL.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.route-filter-cache-enabled
properties.description: Enables the route filter cache, defaults to false.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.route-refresh-listener.enabled
properties.description: If RouteRefreshListener should be turned on.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.set-status.original-status-header-name
properties.description: The name of the header which contains http code of the proxied request.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.x-forwarded.for-append
properties.description: If appending X-Forwarded-For as a list is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.x-forwarded.host-append
properties.description: If appending X-Forwarded-Host as a list is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.x-forwarded.port-append
properties.description: If appending X-Forwarded-Port as a list is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.x-forwarded.prefix-append
properties.description: If appending X-Forwarded-Prefix as a list is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.x-forwarded.proto-append
properties.description: If appending X-Forwarded-Proto as a list is enabled.
